: : Hollywood : :

Hollywood goes to rip his armor, but stops, as he had ju=
st repaired it.

Hollywood:  We really oughtta make our own shirts!...

---=
---------------------------------------------------------------------------=
--------
The preceding announcement has been paid for by the 
New World Ord=
er


  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: RoboRick007 
  To: nbwrpg@yaho=
ogroups.com 
  Sent: Friday, August 16, 2002 7:03 PM
  Subject: Re: Secret =
Messages


  : : Razor : :

  Razor grabs a chunk of rick from the ground a=
nd crushes it in his metal hand.

  Razor: Yesssssssssssssssssssss!!!!!!!!!=
!!!!!!

  *****************************************************************=
**
  The preceding has been paid for by the
  New World Order

    ----- Or=
iginal Message ----- 
    From: LurkerAbyss 
    To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com=
 
    Sent: Friday, August 16, 2002 6:55 PM
    Subject: Re: Secret Message=
s


    : : Sting/Hollywood : :

    Hollywood thinks about his Autobot pas=
t.

    Hollywood:  Damn Maximals got what they deserved, brother!

    Sti=
ng:   They were shattered mercilessly by our awesome power.

    Sting look=
s at the logo.

    Sting:  Indeed, our enemies shall be crushed beneath ou=
r iron fist, and die knowing that their fate was decided by the New World O=
rder!...

    -------------------------------------------------------------=
-------------------------
    The preceding announcement has been paid for =
by the 
    New World Order
      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From:=
 RoboRick007 
      To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
      Sent: Friday, August =
16, 2002 6:41 PM
      Subject: Re: Secret Messages


      : : Razor / Die=
sel ::

      Diesel: The Maximals tried to defend it, but the hanger and t=
he Maximals themselves were left in ruin.

      Razor had a wicked smile a=
t this.

      Razor: Ha ha. Stupid Maximals. You guys our great. Anyway a =
little bit of buisness. 

      Razor brings up the nWo logo on the compute=
r screen.

      Razor: We should all have this logo on us. I want our enem=
ies who know who destroys them!

      ************************************=
*******************************
      The preceding announcement has been p=
aid for by the
      New World Order
        ----- Original Message ----- 
=
        From: LurkerAbyss 
        To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
        Sent=
: Friday, August 16, 2002 6:34 PM
        Subject: Re: Secret Messages


  =
      : : Sting/Hollywood : :

        Hollywood grins.

        Hollywood:=
  It's good to have you all here, brothers!

        He nods at Razor.

   =
     Hollywood:  We could use those parts.  Say, brother, that looks like a=
 pretty high-tech ship.

        Sting:  Yeah, we pirated it from some Maxi=
mals.  At least, I think they owned it.

        --------------------------=
------------------------------------------------------------
        The pr=
eceding announcement has been paid for by the 
        New World Order

   =

              ADVERTISEMENT
